title: What's the difference between hostel blocks?
content:
To my knowledge there are 3, new block(attached bathroom), it block, mess block.
What other factors differenciate between them and which is the best and worst one?

comments.body: In nbx, you’ll get attached bathroom and it’s recently furnished

MM block is the best in hostel (Only seniors stay here ). For juniors you have your separate blocks or floors (NB/NBX,IT,Mess block. NB/NBX would be your best option with attached bathroom. IT and Mess block have common bathroom, IT rooms are bigger and better than Mess block.
